name: Photorealistic Rendering
desc: Rendered photorealistic videos are crafted for design reviews and stakeholder meetings, ensuring effective communication when physical products are unavailable.

name: Industrial Virtual Reality
desc: Implemented a VR system for design evaluation, optimizing models for VR use while maintaining quality of 3D models.

name: Material Data Sheets
desc: Ensured IMDS data accuracy while enhancing collaboration with Volvo CE, MSK Slovakia and over 150 suppliers world wide.

name: Layout Design
desc: Developed 2D production layout desgin for Componenta Oy, enhancing workflows with clearly defined operational zones.

name: Excel Tool For Transportation
desc: Optimized transport using Solid Edge CAD and creating Excel tool for reducing empty space in truck loading.
